block.p: Melissa Lynn Greene, the daughter of Yolanda M. Greene of Baldwin, N.Y., and Alby I. Greene of Hewlett, N.Y., is to be married today to Alexander Crispen Robinson, the son of Priscilla Robinson and Dr. Edward L. Robinson of Austin, Tex. Steve Fogel of the Movement of Spiritual Inner Awareness is to officiate at Fox Hollow, a caterer in Woodbury, N.Y.
The couple graduated from Haverford College, where they met.

Melissa Lynn Greene, the daughter of Yolanda M. Greene of Baldwin, N.Y., and Alby I. Greene of Hewlett, N.Y., is to be married today to Alexander Crispen Robinson, the son of Priscilla Robinson and Dr. Edward L. Robinson of Austin, Tex. Steve Fogel of the Movement of Spiritual Inner Awareness is to officiate at Fox Hollow, a caterer in Woodbury, N.Y.
The couple graduated from Haverford College, where they met.

The bride, 25, is a candidate for a Ph.D. in clinical psychology at New York University, from which she received a master's degree in psychology. Her father is the controller of Chavin Lambert Advertising in New York. Her mother is an administrative assistant at Benjamin Development, a real estate company in Garden City, N.Y.

The bridegroom, 26, is an associate analyst at Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette, a New York investment bank. His mother is an artist with studios in Austin and Taos, N.M. His father is a professor of astronomy at the University of Texas at Austin.
